text: Orchesography is an enhanced form of choreography that includes details of the music to accompany the dance. Orchesography may also refer to: *Orchesography, dancing manual by Thoinot Arbeau (1598) *Orchesography, dancing manual by Raoul Auger Feuillet (1701) *Orchesography (album), by English new wave band Wang Chung
title: Orchesography
